name: exactingly
content:

in a way that demands or involves a lot of effort, care, or attention: The fish is exactingly prepared to achieve the perfect texture. The chair is finished to exactingly high standards and covered with fine leather. Each computer code has its own rules, and each must be used exactingly. Related word
